samples.name: POL_FLAG_1
samples.description: Flag indicating antenna HH (0) or VV (1) polarisation

samples.name: POL_FLAG_2
samples.description: Flag indicating Real and Imaginary part of the HV polarization when the instrument was in VHH+HVH+HHV arm configuration

samples.name: SUN_FOV
samples.description: Direct Sun correction for the Sun in the front of the FOV has been performed during image reconstruction of this pixel

samples.name: SUN_GLINT_FOV
samples.description: Reflected Sun correction has been performed during image reconstruction of this pixel. Sun correction is based on the Sea bistatic coefficients defined in the AUX_BSCAT ADF and computed for a fixed wind speed of 7 m/s and wind direction of 0 deg North

samples.name: MOON_FOV
samples.description: Direct Moon correction has been performed during image reconstruction of this pixel

samples.name: SUN_POINT
samples.description: Pixel is located in a zone (circle around Sun alias position with radius configurable through Sun_Point_Flag_Size field in AUX CNFL1P) where a Sun alias was reconstructed (if Sun removal is active, measurement may be degraded)

samples.name: SUN_GLINT_AREA
samples.description: Pixel is located in a zone where Sun reflection has been detected using the bi-static scattering coefficient threshold defined in the configuration file

samples.name: MOON_POINT
samples.description: Pixel is located in a zone where a Moon alias was reconstructed (after Moon removal, measurement may be degraded)

samples.name: AF_FOV
samples.description: Pixel is inside the exclusive zone of Alias free (delimited by the six aliased unit circles)

samples.name: BORDER_FOV
samples.description: Pixel is close to the border delimiting the Extended Alias free zone or to the unit circle replicas borders (also known as “suspenders and belts”). Distance threshold is configurable through FOV_Border_Flag_Size field in AUX CNFL1P

samples.name: SUN_TAILS
samples.description: Pixel is located in the hexagonal alias directions centred on a Sun alias (if Sun is not removed, measurement may be degraded in these directions)

samples.name: RFI_POINT_SOURCE
samples.description: Measurement is affected by point source RFI as identified in the AUX RFI list (flag is set in a circle around the RFI position, with a radius dependant on the RFI expected BT defined in the AUX RFILST), or it has exceeded the threshold defined in BT_Dual/Full_RFI_Pixel_Flag_Threshold fields in AUX CNFL1P, or is negative for Dual Polarisation values

samples.name: RFI_TAIL
samples.description: Measurement is affected by the tails of a point source RFI as identified in the AUX RFI list (tail width is dependant on the RFI estimated BT (from each snapshot measurements) , corresponding to 0.16 of the radius of the RFI circle flagged)

samples.name: RFI_FLAG_1
samples.description: Measurement is affected by a point source RFI identified in the AUX RFI list whose contribution generates a contamination in BT above a certain level defined in the AUX CNFL1P file

samples.name: RFI_FLAG_2
samples.description: Measurement is affected by a point source RFI identified in the AUX RFI list whose contribution generates a contamination in BT above a certain level defined in the AUX CNFL1P file

samples.name: USGS_SEA_FLAG
samples.description: Water fraction is above 95 percent (1); below 95 percent (0)

samples.name: USGS_LAND_FLAG
samples.description: Water fraction is below 10 percent (1); above 10 percent (0)

samples.name: USGS_MIXED_FLAG
samples.description: Water fraction is above 10 and below 95 percent (1); below 10 or above 95 percent (0)

samples.name: 200_KM_COASTAL_FLAG
samples.description: Distance to coastline is less than 200 km (1); greater than 200 km (0)

samples.name: 100_KM_COASTAL_FLAG
samples.description: Distance to coastline is less than 100 km (1); greater than 100 km (0)

samples.name: 40_KM_COASTAL_FLAG
samples.description: Distance to coastline is less than 40 km (1); greater than 40 km (0)

samples.name: MIN_SEA_ICE_FLAG
samples.description: Sea ice is present for all months (1); is not present for all months (0)

samples.name: MAX_SEA_ICE_FLAG
samples.description: Sea ice is present for any months (1); is not present for any months (0)

bands.name: BT_Value_X
bands.description: Brightness temperature measurement over current Earth fixed grid point, obtained by DFT interpolation from L1b data, antenna X polarisation

bands.name: BT_Value_Y
bands.description: Brightness temperature measurement over current Earth fixed grid point, obtained by DFT interpolation from L1b data, antenna Y polarisation

bands.name: BT_Value_XY_Real
bands.description: Brightness temperature measurement over current Earth fixed grid point, obtained by DFT interpolation from L1b data, antenna XY polarisation, real value

bands.name: BT_Value_XY_Imag
bands.description: Brightness temperature measurement over current Earth fixed grid point, obtained by DFT interpolation from L1b data, antenna XY polarisation, imaginary value

bands.name: Azimuth_Angle_X
bands.description: Azimuth angle value corresponding to the measured BT value over current Earth fixed grid point, antenna X polarisation

bands.name: Azimuth_Angle_Y
bands.description: Azimuth angle value corresponding to the measured BT value over current Earth fixed grid point, antenna Y polarisation

bands.name: Azimuth_Angle_XY
bands.description: Azimuth angle value corresponding to the measured BT value over current Earth fixed grid point, antenna XY polarisation

bands.name: Footprint_Axis1_X
bands.description: Elliptical footprint major semi-axis value, antenna X polarisation

bands.name: Footprint_Axis1_Y
bands.description: Elliptical footprint major semi-axis value, antenna Y polarisation

bands.name: Footprint_Axis1_XY
bands.description: Elliptical footprint major semi-axis value, antenna XY polarisation

bands.name: Footprint_Axis2_X
bands.description: Elliptical footprint minor semi-axis value, antenna X polarisation

bands.name: Footprint_Axis2_Y
bands.description: Elliptical footprint minor semi-axis value, antenna Y polarisation

bands.name: Footprint_Axis2_XY
bands.description: Elliptical footprint minor semi-axis value, antenna XY polarisation

bands.name: Flags_X
bands.description: L1c flags applicable to the pixel for this particular integration time, antenna X polarisation

bands.name: Flags_Y
bands.description: L1c flags applicable to the pixel for this particular integration time, antenna Y polarisation

bands.name: Flags_XY
bands.description: L1c flags applicable to the pixel for this particular integration time, antenna XY polarisation

bands.name: Land_Sea_Mask
bands.description: Flag indicating Land/Sea USGS content, Coastline distance, and Ice content

masks.name: Flags_X_POL_FLAG_1
masks.description: Flag indicating antenna HH (0) or VV (1) polarisation

masks.name: Flags_X_POL_FLAG_2
masks.description: Flag indicating Real and Imaginary part of the HV polarization when the instrument was in VHH+HVH+HHV arm configuration

masks.name: Flags_X_SUN_FOV
masks.description: Direct Sun correction for the Sun in the front of the FOV has been performed during image reconstruction of this pixel

masks.description: Reflected Sun correction has been performed during image reconstruction of this pixel. Sun correction is based on the Sea bistatic coefficients defined in the AUX_BSCAT ADF and computed for a fixed wind speed of 7 m/s and wind direction of 0 deg North

masks.name: Flags_X_MOON_FOV
masks.description: Direct Moon correction has been performed during image reconstruction of this pixel

masks.name: Flags_X_SINGLE_SNAPSHOT
masks.description: Scene has not been combined with an adjacent scene in opposite polarisation during image reconstruction to account for crosspolarisation leakage (it has been processed with only co-polar antenna patterns information)

masks.description: Pixel is located in a zone (circle around Sun alias position with radius configurable through Sun_Point_Flag_Size field in AUX CNFL1P) where a Sun alias was reconstructed (if Sun removal is active, measurement may be degraded)

masks.description: Distance to coastline is less than 200 km (1); greater than 200 km (0)

masks.description: Distance to coastline is less than 100 km (1); greater than 100 km (0)

masks.description: Distance to coastline is less than 40 km (1); greater than 40 km (0)
